author: Football Italia staff
title: Coronavirus: Active cases drop
description: There were another 454 coronavirus deaths reported in Italy on Monday, but the number of active positive cases has dropped.  	Although the death toll has risen at a faster rate than yesterday (454 compared to 433), there are now 20 less people with the virus.
content:
There were another 454 coronavirus deaths reported in Italy on Monday, but the number of active positive cases has dropped.
Although the death toll has risen at a faster rate than yesterday (454 compared to 433), there are now 20 less people with the virus.… [+715 chars]
